Hamad Port Visitors Center
23  May,  2024
A visit was arranged for Pearling Season International School, International School of London, Awsaj Academy, Amal Center, Qish Center, and Al Tamakon School to Hamad Port Visitors Center. The aim was to tour the port's history for friends at the center, learn about the port's establishment, visit the aquarium, explore different types of fish, and
watch a 3D documentary video.
